title: Storm Brewing In Bering Sea Set To Hit Alaska
teaser: Alaska is hunkering down for a powerful storm in the Bering Sea that's expected to hit the Aleutian Islands.
contentencoded:
This weekend, Alaska is hunkering down for a powerful storm in the Bering Sea that’s expected to hit the Aleutian Islands.

It’s the remnants of Typhoon Nuri and it comes with hurricane-like wind gusts, and waves up to 50 feet tall.

Lauren Rosenthal, news director for KUCB Unalaska Community Broadcasting in Unalaska, Alaska, joins Here & Now’s Sacha Pfeiffer to talk about what Alaska residents are doing to prepare

Guest

  • Lauren Rosenthal, news director for KUCB, Unalaska Community Broadcasting. She tweets @laurenthal.
